entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: SW 40 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening and ending late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
